official_title: Information Needs, Preferences, and Understanding Trial (INPUT): A Randomized, Controlled Trial of the Effects of a Screening Tool on Illness Understanding
inclusion_criteria:
* Within 3 months of biopsy-confirmed diagnosis of stage IV lung cancer
* Age 18 or over
* English speaking
* Attending a follow-up visit at the thoracic medical oncology clinic
* Plans to receive or actively undergoing cancer-directed systemic treatment at MD Anderson
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
